name: Nagadus Emerald Gemstone
description: Character Ascension material.  "I had a very, very long dream..."  "In it, people were holding hands, dancing in a circle, be they sages orfools, dancers or warriors, puppets or statues of gods..."  "That dancing circle embodied everything about the universe. Life has alwaysbeen the end, while it is wisdom that shall be the means."
